name: Castle Agony
description: Welcome to Agony. Inspired by the Resident Evil of old, the golden age of NES gaming and the Castlevania series, you play a local hero with a dog! Forced by your village to enter the crumbling castle filled with trickery, magic and monsters! Can you defeat The Vampire and live to see another dawn?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 64 MB RAM Graphics: 640x480, 32-bit colour: 700 Mhz system minimum DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible cards
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 640x480, 32-bit colour: 700 Mhz system minimum DirectX: Version 9.0c Sound Card: All DirectX-compatible cards
